long_description: Rely on the expert fit and performance fabric of the Strider shorts from Patagonia to enhance your comfort on the run. Quick-drying, stretchy outer fabric provides air circulation and wicks moisture to keep you comfortable; fabric is half recycled. Fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying liner briefs offer a comfortable fit without being too tight; fabric is half recycled. Internal envelope pocket stores a key or card; reflective logo improves visibility. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes fit; Patagonia Strider shorts offer a regular fit that won't bind or chafe.
short_description: Rely on the expert fit and performance fabric of the Strider shorts from Patagonia to enhance your comfort on the run.
